rooms.description: Grand entrance with a shaded verandah.
Spacious living area adjacent to courtyard and garage access.
Traditional Kerala-style kitchen integrated with dining space, facing the courtyard for natural ventilation.
Adjacent to the kitchen and living room, providing a communal dining area.
Guest bathroom on ground floor for convenience.
Space for utilities and storage, ensuring adherence to Vastu for energy flow.

openings.description: Large windows to allow ample natural light and align with Vastu.
Dual opening for two-car garage leading to the courtyard.

special_features.description: Traditional Kerala central courtyard acting as a focal point and natural light source.
Integrated two-car garage with direct access to the villa.
